text: Please share if you find something! I loved IntelliJ in college and would switch back from VScode if I knew of a good Jetbrains alternative

<@U02H4264WMB> Unfortunately PyCharm wasn't really doing it for me either... I am using VS code now with the HubSpot plugin.

I also found this article quite useful. It's still not quite the same as an IDE but it does help.

<https://javascript.plainenglish.io/how-to-switch-from-webstorm-to-vs-code-4e70c3025135>

I see that Visual Studio 2022 now supports Javascript etc - so it may be an option worth investigating... I wonder if the HubSpot plugin will work for it?
I am on Linux so I haven't been able to try it.
